product_name: Sierra Designs Cloud Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ultralight and packable, the waterproof Cloud Pants from Sierra Designs are easy to stash in your backpack and you'll be thankful to have them when that distant thunderstorm turns into a downpour. Waterproof, breathable nylon fabric protects you from rainy weather without letting you overheat. Adjustable waistband offers a perfect fit; lower leg zippers offer ventilation and easy on/off over boots. Sierra Designs Cloud Pants pack down into pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Ultralight and packable, the waterproof Cloud Pants from Sierra Designs are easy to stash in your backpack and you'll be thankful to have them when that distant thunderstorm turns into a downpour.
